verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> [T'al-above הַגִּתִּ֗ית <S%H1665><s%> hag-git-Tit, upon Gittith מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid. of David יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אֲדֹנֵ֗ינוּ <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Nei-nu, our Lord מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- How אַדִּ֣יר <S%H117><s%> 'ad-Dir how excellent שִׁ֭מְךָ <S%H8034><s%> me-cha [is] thy name בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; in all the earth אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher Who תְּנָ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> te-Nah who hast set ה֝וֹדְךָ֗ <S%H1935><s%> hod-cha, thy glory עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- above הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim. above the heavens

מִפִּ֤י <S%H6310><s%> mip-Pi Out of the mouth עֽוֹלְלִ֨ים׀ <S%H5768><s%> 'ol-Lim of babes וְֽיֹנְקִים֮ <S%H3243><s%> ve-yo-ne-Kim and sucklings יִסַּ֪דְתָּ֫ <S%H3245><s%> yis-Sad-ta hast thou ordained עֹ֥ז <S%H5797><s%> 'oz strength לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an Because צוֹרְרֶ֑יךָ <S%H6887><s%> tzor-Rei-cha; because of thine enemies לְהַשְׁבִּ֥ית <S%H7673><s%> le-hash-Bit that thou mightest still א֝וֹיֵ֗ב <S%H341><s%> o-Yev, the enemy וּמִתְנַקֵּֽם׃ <S%H5358><s%> u-mit-nak-Kem. and the avenger

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- When אֶרְאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> 'er-'Eh When I consider שָׁ֭מֶיךָ <S%H8064><s%> mei-cha thy heavens מַעֲשֵׂ֣י <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Sei the work אֶצְבְּעֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H676><s%> 'etz-be-'o-Tei-cha; of thy fingers יָרֵ֥חַ <S%H3394><s%> ya-Re-ach the moon וְ֝כוֹכָבִ֗ים <S%H3556><s%> ve-cho-cha-Vim, and the stars אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which כּוֹנָֽנְתָּה׃ <S%H3559><s%> ko-Na-ne-tah. which thou hast ordained

מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What אֱנ֥וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> e-Noosh What is man כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that תִזְכְּרֶ֑נּוּ <S%H2142><s%> tiz-ke-Ren-nu; that thou art mindful וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> u-ven- of him;and the son אָ֝דָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of man כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki that תִפְקְדֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H6485><s%> tif-ke-Den-nu. that thou visitest

וַתְּחַסְּרֵ֣הוּ <S%H2637><s%> vat-te-chas-se-Re-hu lower מְּ֭עַט <S%H4592><s%> Me-'at For thou hast made him a little מֵאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> me-'E-lo-Him; than the angels וְכָב֖וֹד <S%H3519><s%> ve-cha-Vod him with glory וְהָדָ֣ר <S%H1926><s%> ve-ha-Dar and honour תְּעַטְּרֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H5849><s%> te-'at-te-Re-hu. and hast crowned

תַּ֭מְשִׁילֵהוּ <S%H4910><s%> Tam-shi-le-hu Thou madest him to have dominion בְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣י <S%H4639><s%> be-ma-'a-Sei over the works יָדֶ֑יךָ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dei-cha; of thy hands כֹּ֝ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all שַׁ֣תָּה <S%H7896><s%> Shat-tah thou hast put תַֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> ta-chat- under רַגְלָֽיו׃ <S%H7272><s%> rag-Lav. all [things] under his feet

צֹנֶ֣ה <S%H6792><s%> tzo-Neh All sheep וַאֲלָפִ֣ים <S%H504><s%> va-'a-la-Fim and oxen כֻּלָּ֑ם <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam; All וְ֝גַ֗ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam, and also בַּהֲמ֥וֹת <S%H929><s%> ba-ha-Mot yea and the beasts שָׂדָֽי׃ <S%H7704><s%> sa-Dai. of the field

צִפּ֣וֹר <S%H6833><s%> tzip-Por The fowl שָׁ֭מַיִם <S%H8064><s%> ma-yim of the air וּדְגֵ֣י <S%H1709><s%> u-de-Gei and the fish הַיָּ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam; of the sea עֹ֝בֵ֗ר <S%H5674><s%> 'o-Ver, [and whatsoever] passeth through אָרְח֥וֹת <S%H734><s%> a-re-Chot the paths יַמִּֽים׃ <S%H3220><s%> yam-Mim. of the seas

יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אֲדֹנֵ֑ינוּ <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Nei-nu; our Lord מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- How אַדִּ֥יר <S%H117><s%> 'ad-Dir how excellent שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ <S%H8034><s%> me-Cha, [is] thy name בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. in all the earth
